specialRules.hint: When the hero and his unit are activated pick one of the following canticles, and they get one of these special rules until the end of the round: • Incantation: +3” when moving • Benediction: AP(+1) when shooting • Invocation: AP(+1) when in melee • Psalm: enemies get -1 to melee hits EMP: This weapon counts as having Rending but only needs rolls of 5-6 to take effect.
specialRules.name: Canticles
specialRules.label: Canticles
specialRules.description: When the hero and his unit are activated pick one of the following canticles, and they get one of these special rules until the end of the round: • Incantation: +3” when moving • Benediction: AP(+1) when shooting • Invocation: AP(+1) when in melee • Psalm: enemies get -1 to melee hits EMP: This weapon counts as having Rending but only needs rolls of 5-6 to take effect.

specialRules.hint: Enemies that roll to block hits from this weapon take one additional wound for each unmodified result of 1 that they roll.
specialRules.name: Radiation
specialRules.label: Radiation
specialRules.description: Enemies that roll to block hits from this weapon take one additional wound for each unmodified result of 1 that they roll.

specialRules.hint: Once per turn, if within 2” of a unit with Tough, roll one die. On a 2+ you may repair 3 wounds from the target.
specialRules.name: Repair Master
specialRules.label: Repair Master
specialRules.description: Once per turn, if within 2” of a unit with Tough, roll one die. On a 2+ you may repair 3 wounds from the target.

specialRules.hint: For each unmodified result of 6 you roll to hit that hit is multiplied by 4.
specialRules.name: Taser
specialRules.label: Taser
specialRules.description: For each unmodified result of 6 you roll to hit that hit is multiplied by 4.

specialRules.hint: Whenever an enemy unit charges this model roll one die per charging model. For each 4+ it takes 1 hit with AP(1).
specialRules.name: Anti-Charge System
specialRules.label: Anti-Charge System
specialRules.description: Whenever an enemy unit charges this model roll one die per charging model. For each 4+ it takes 1 hit with AP(1).

spells.name: Lock-On
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12” gets AP(+1) next time it shoots.

spells.name: Solar Beam
spells.effect: Target enemy model within 12” takes 1 automatic hit with AP(2).

spells.name: Steel Body
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12” may heal 1 wound or restore 1 model (with only 1 health left if it had Tough).

spells.name: Shrapnel
spells.effect: Target 2 enemy units within 6” take 3 automatic hits with AP(2) each.

spells.name: Corroded Metal
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12” gets -2 to defense next time it takes hits.

spells.name: Machine Terror
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12” takes 8 automatic hits.
